CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "Windows", 1, IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "Unix", 2, IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "Linux", 2, IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "Android", 3, IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "iOS", 4, IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "Own System", 5, IF(TEXT(What_is_the_operating_system__c) = "None", 1, 0)))))))
CustomField.label: Operating SystemR
